instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2936: What is 820-2936? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.ISL6259: What is ISL6259? This is a charging chip for Macbook motherboards from 2010 through 2015.
definitions.R7051: What is R7051? Current sense resistor between battery current sense shunt resistor and ISL6259. When these resistors fail the ISL6259 cannot gauge how much current is being sent to or drawn from the battery, which will cause the ISL6259 to stop drawing/sending power to the battery as a safety precaution. Symptoms are low voltage on PPBUS_G3H, quarter fan spin, boot looping, or battery not charging..

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> External Video Only Works Via VGA
threads.message: Hello. Got this board dead, no power. <CHIP>ISL6259</CHIP> failure. Replaced it and <RESISTOR>R7051</RESISTOR>/52 as they were fried. Board works now. Internal video ok, external video only works with Mini DP to VGA adapter. Mini DP to HDMI does not work. Known good adapter, works on another machine. Where should I start? Never got this issue before.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> External Video Only Works Via VGA
threads.message:
Try another adapter.
Apple specifies third-party adapter for HDMI output.

"[B] Thunderbolt digital video output[/B]    
[LIST]
[*]Native Mini DisplayPort output
[*]DVI output using Mini DisplayPort to DVI Adapter (optional)
[*]VGA output using Mini DisplayPort to VGA Adapter (optional)
[*]Dual-link DVI output using Mini DisplayPort to Dual-Link DVI Adapter supports 30-inch Apple Cinema HD Display (optional)
[*]HDMI audio and video output using a [U][B]third-party[/B][/U] Mini DisplayPort to HDMI Adapter"
[/LIST]

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> External Video Only Works Via VGA
threads.message: I tried 3 different working adapters. Also, costumer complained it wasn’t working with his own HDMI adapter before machine died. So it’s for sure not an adapter issue

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> External Video Only Works Via VGA
threads.message:
Conversion DP to HDMI is done inside the external adapter.
Same as for VGA; you can see CRT (RGB) outputs of PCH are not connected.

Check <SIGNAL>T29DPA_HPD</SIGNAL> level, when connect HDMI monitor.
